scripts.start: concurrently "eleventy --serve --port=8080" "npx tailwindcss -i styles/input.css -c styles/tailwind.config.js -o dist/tailwind.css --minify" "npm run minify-js -- --watch"
scripts.build: ELEVENTY_PRODUCTION=true eleventy && NODE_ENV=production npx tailwindcss -i styles/input.css -c styles/tailwind.config.js -o dist/tailwind.css --minify && npm run minify-js
scripts.minify-js: mkdir -p dist/js && terser src/js/main.js -o dist/js/main.min.js -c -m && terser src/js/insights-and-strategies.js -o dist/js/insights-and-strategies.min.js -c -m
